NAVY FITNESS APPLICATION TERMS, CONDITIONS AND DISCLAIMER 
\General Terms.

In these Terms of Use references to ‘Defence’ include its employees, agents, contractors, sub-contractors and volunteers where the context allows. By using this Application, you accept these Terms of Use and agree to be bound by them. Defence may at any time without notice revise these Terms of Use by updating this page and we encourage you to periodically visit this page by clicking the ‘Terms and Privacy’ link in the Application menu. 
• Defence has created this Application to provide you with a guide to understanding the fitness requirements when applying for entry into the Navy and to support the development of fitness in preparation for initial training. Defence provides no guarantee that following the instructions and exercises contained in this Application will lead to your acceptance into the Australian Defence Force (ADF) or that you will necessarily satisfy the Army or Air Force Pre-Entry Fitness Assessments. Use of this Application is voluntary and is not a requirement to apply for entry into the ADF.

To use some features of this Application and for updates, you must enable 3G, 4G or 5G and/or Wi-Fi data connection, location services and push notifications on your compatible mobile device and provide any approvals/consents in the manner required. 
• You must have the bill payer's consent to use Internet or mobile Internet to use this Application. Some service providers and mobile devices may not provide access to mobile Internet and you must check with their service provider if unsure. Data charges will remain your responsibility and will vary depending on the Internet service provider, usage plan or mobile carrier used (as applicable). You will need to refer to the terms of the contracts with your mobile carrier, usage plan or Internet service provider (as applicable) for costs. The charges for all data services will appear on your next mobile phone bill and/or Internet bill (as applicable). All general queries relating to carrier rates or mobile or Internet bills should be directed to your mobile phone carrier or Internet service provider (as applicable). 
• If you are the driver of a vehicle (or other form of transport), you must not use this Application while the vehicle (or other form of transport) is moving or is stationary but not lawfully parked. You must comply with all applicable road rules and regulations before and while using this Application. In the interests of safety at all other times, Defence recommends that you only use this Application when it is lawful and safe to do so.

• This Application is compatible with Apple iPhone / iPod Touch running iOS 7 or greater and Most Android devices running Android 4.1 or greater. Seek Advice from Your Medical Professional. 
• This Application contains information about and descriptions of physical exercises and fitness programs. This information is a guide only and does not take into consideration your personal circumstances, medical condition or fitness level. 
• Before using this Application or attempting any fitness program or exercise contained or described in this Application, you should consult with your independent medical professional to ensure that you are aware of your current health and any physical restrictions or limitations that are appropriate to you. This Application is not a substitute for independent professional or medical advice. If there are any unanticipated changes to your health or physical condition at any time, you should immediately seek medical attention. You must consult a qualified medical professional if you have any questions about your medical condition or any injury. 
• You require a moderate level of fitness to complete the exercises and fitness programs described in this Application. You are responsible for making your own enquiries and seeking independent advice before attempting any exercises or fitness programs described in this Application. If you have any pre-existing medical conditions or are in poor health you should consult with an appropriately qualified healthcare professional before attempting any exercises or fitness programs described in this Application. 
• Nothing contained in this Application is intended to be used as medical advice. Before relying on any information or following any instructions contained within this Application, you should carefully consider the accuracy and relevance of the information and obtain appropriate independent professional medical advice. Use Application at Your Own Risk. 
• You use this Application at your own risk. By using this Application, you agree to indemnify and hold harmless Defence from and against any direct or indirect liability, loss, damage cost or expense arising out of, or in connection with, your use of this Application or its use by anyone else who uses the Application by accessing your device or Account. 
• You acknowledge that this Application is an information service only and that you are solely responsible for any exercises or fitness programs you choose to undertake. Defence does not provide any supervision of your activity and is not responsible for any injuries that you may suffer as a result of following any particular exercise, instruction or fitness program contained in this Application. • You may only use this Application if you are an Australian citizen aged 16 years and 6 months or older and, if you are under 18 years of age, with the consent of your parent or legal guardian. The Application may only be used in Australia and Defence makes no representation that it is appropriate or available for use in all locations. 
• You will not be able to use the Application unless you have signed up in the manner required (which includes accepting these Terms of Use and the terms of Defence’s Privacy Policy and Collection Statement). As part of the sign-up process, you will be required to create an account using your name, email address, and selecting a password in the manner required (Account). You will only be required to sign up once; however, you may be required to log in each time you wish to use the Application. 
• You may never use another person’s device or Account without permission. 
• You are responsible for any activity under your device and / or Account. It is your sole responsibility to control access to and use of your device and / or Account. Defence will not be responsible or liable for any loss or damage arising from your failure to comply with this provision.

Defence’s legal rights to recover damages or other compensation from such an offender are reserved. Using the Application. 
• This Application provides you with information about Navy entry requirements and descriptions of a variety of fitness exercises that you may choose to follow. 
• To monitor your progress and to generate exercises appropriate to your fitness level, you must ensure that all data and information entered into the Application is accurate and complete and genuinely reflects your performance in each exercise. 
• Fitness programs, exercises, recommendations, and results generated by this Application are generic, pre-programmed, automated responses based on the data and information that you enter into this Application. They do not take into account any other factors that may be relevant to you and may not be appropriate in your personal circumstances. Such fitness programs, exercises, recommendations, and results are provided for information purposes only and do not constitute medical or professional advice. To the extent permitted by law, Defence is not liable or responsible for any fitness programs, exercises, recommendations, and results generated through your use of this Application. Contacting You and Your Privacy. 
• Defence will collect, use, and disclose your Personal Information in accordance with its Privacy Policy and Collection Statement and these Term of Use. 
• By using this Application and providing your details in the manner required, you agree that Defence (including the ADF and their agents and contractors) may contact you to provide you with information about applying for opportunities with the ADF and with other direct marketing materials, including via the Application and electronically. Rights to the Deletion of Personal Information. 
• To withdraw your personal data from the Navy Fitness App, open the Application, go to the Settings screen and select Delete Account. Intellectual Property.

Even if you have an Account, your ability to access and use the Application may be terminated at any time without notice to you. If you do not agree to these Terms of Use, you must immediately exit the Application and delete the Application from your device. Contact Us. 
• Any queries in relation to using this Application can be directed to pcp.team@defence.gov.au Privacy Collection Statement. 
• The Department of Defence (Defence) collects personal information about you via the Navy Fitness mobile application (Application) including but not limited to your full name and email address and as otherwise provided by you via the Application. Defence does not intend to collect personal information from any person under 16 years and 6 months of age. Please do not provide personal information if you are aged under 16 years and 6 months. Personal information is collected for the purpose of administering the Application and to allow you to measure your progress and results. You also acknowledge that a further primary purpose of collection of your personal information is to allow Defence to contact you with direct marketing materials (including recruitment materials) including via the Application and electronically, and you expressly consent to receiving such materials. 
• For the purposes described above, your information may be shared with the Australian Defence Force, other Australian Government agencies/departments, Defence’s promotional partners, professional service providers, and other trusted third parties, either in Australia or overseas. 
• Failure to provide personal information to Defence will result in you being unable to use the Application. 
• The Application may store natively on your device personal information you enter for the purpose of using the Application, and information about your usage of the Application. Defence does not collect this information or share it with any third party. 
• Defence takes reasonable steps to ensure the security of all information collected, including that the information is protected from misuse and loss and from unauthorised access, modification or disclosure. For example, your personal information is maintained in a secure environment which can be accessed only by authorised personnel. However, no data transmission over the internet or information stored on servers accessible through the internet can be guaranteed to be fully secure. 
• Defence takes reasonable steps to destroy or de-identify your personal information once Defence no longer needs it or has been instructed by you to permanently remove or suppress your personal information. 
• Defence’s Privacy Policy contains information about how you can access and correct your personal information, how you can lodge a complaint regarding the handling of your personal information, and how any complaint will be handled by Defence. You may contact Defence Privacy with any queries via email: defence.privacy@defence.gov.au.
